content.detailedDescription: Here are additional moon pictures ,no flash, normal, usining tints, and reverse contrast. via my droid 2 i phone. most of pictures contain object in all catagories. g.A. from whittier.
content.summary: Caught object circling moon have more pictures to add

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking with a companion around park lake/fox's pond at the border of rockaway borough and rockaway township. i had started my walk at 7:40 pm and it was my second lap around the lake, so it was about 8 to 8:10 pm. i was talking to my friend when the sky behind her head brightened. a huge bluish white fireball descended in the wsw sky. it was shaped like a comet. it's tail was quite thick and not very long. it had a rippling very bright appearance like melting metal. it descended slightly slower than a meteor and was far larger than any meteor i have ever seen and i have seen many because i purposely go out to view meteor showers when they are predicted. typically meteors i have seen have been far smaller, faster and have had longer streaks behind.
i was so startled that i pointed and yelled but my friend did not know what was wrong and did not see the object. it was much larger than jupiter and the other planet nearby (venus?).
it descended behind the trees and small hill. i expected the ground to shake when it hit the ground but it did not.
it crossed my mind that it could have been a satellite falling to earth, a spherical aircraft of some sort or an asteroid. immediately after i had fear that it would have crashed and destroyed part of dover/rockaway township.
afterwards i felt excited and somewhat privileged to have seen something so awesome. but i wondered if anyone else saw it and if it set anything on fire and if there would be anything found from it.
content.summary: Very large blue white fireball in wsw sky in morris county nj

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in the car with my mom at around 4:30 pm. we had art club at school, so my mom had to come pick me up. a few minutes from home, i noticed in the sky a white/gray disc over the trees. i noticed because, well, you never see that stuff around here. i pointed it out to my mom, but she said "yeah, ok" and didn't even try to look. she probably didn't believe me because i talk about this kind of stuff all the time. it looked like it was just hovering over the trees and as soon as i noticed it seemed to turn the direction we were driving and fly off suddenly. i couldn't see where it went because the trees were too tall and we were already home by then. when i first saw it, my heart raced, but i wasn't scared. i was actually excited because i love this kind of stuff, as i said before. now i'm happy because i've always wanted to see a ufo.
content.summary: White and grey disc object hovering in sky in the afternoon

content.detailedDescription: Hi! wow!  look at these pictures. the moon has an object circling it! this is not the only time i found this anomaly! looks like a mini moon or large object! it is night. moon over head. i used my droid 2 and used reverse light. normal, blue tint, red tints green tints, etc. no flash, no glare! this is wild!  more pictures to come. only three pictures per report. mufon may incorporate as they chose to! i have a dozen! g. a from whittier, calif.
content.summary: Found large object circling moon!

content.detailedDescription: Hi! wow!  look at these pictures. the moon has an object circling it! this is not the only time i found this anomaly! looks like a mini moon or large object! it is night. moon over head. i used my droid 2 and used reverse light. normal, blue tint, red tints green tints, etc. no flash, no glare! this is wild!  more pictures to come. only three pictures per report. mufon may incorporate as they chose to! i have a dozen! g. a from whittier, calif.
content.summary: Found large object circling moon!

content.detailedDescription: i was up late on the night of 2/16/12; for i had a deposition hearing on a business matter the next morning. i was reviewing records, getting my head straight for the next morning and such things, and decided to step out for smoke before retiring in for the night. i frequently do this because there is no smoking in the house. i live in pownal, maine. near the bradbury mountain state park. coastal. 30 mins. to the south your in portland, 30 min. to the north your in lewiston/auburn. pownal sisters freeport. quiet and rural. deathly quiet at 3:00 a.M. live on a back dirt road; lucky to hear a car go by at that hour. anyway, after stepping out that night and off my porch area into the front yard, i lite my smoke and hear a dull audible rumble, kind of jet like when its fairly high. we hear planes and jets and the such for we live not to far from the international airport in portland....And about the same distance from the brunswick naval air station; now decommissioned not long ago. i looked up behind me and overhead towards the apparent rumble and didn't see anything, then up in front of me and saw the craft. at about 80-85 degrees off horizon. it had already passed slightly over and by me at this point. i'm not sure if it passed over as i was standing there...As i didn't hear it until it passed overhead. it sounded kind of like your furnace kicking on when your outside on a quiet night. a muffled rumble you hear out your chimney. i saw a dark triangular craft with a single solid white light on each of its points and a smaller blinking red light to the center. the front light seemed a little further front than the back two were apart. i'd say like a pizza slice. elongated slightly. all lights appeared to be on the bottom. it was too dark to make out any tail or appendages but there were certainly no other lights on the craft. my first impression was that it was a jet of some sorts...Mainly because i could hear it. sounded like a smooth running mercedes of jet motors, quiet with that dull rumble. it was low enough that i could make out the black triangle body against the night sky between the lighted tips. it came from the west and was headed east on a straight line. appeared to be headed directly over the bradbury mountain state park, on course to the naval air station on the coast...About twenty minutes by car. it seemed to me to be with-in the 500 ft. to 1/2 mile up zone. best guess estimate 1,200 ft. fairly low and close. i watched it all the way clearly go off and away for about three solid min. maybe five. until it got to about 35-40  degrees off horizon and the lights on the bottom broke plane where i couldn't see them anymore. it moved (flew), very slowly....Almost gliding i guess would best describe it. the rumble seemed to match the speed as well. low,slow,dull. lived here for about 10 years plus, and most jets and the like where flying out of the airbase in brunswick, especially the lower flights heading in toward that way. i've thought and talked about the sighting these last couple weeks, and decided tonight to check out this site for maybe any other sightings in the area, and to make a formal statement. i know others have seen similar objects over the years and believe them to be true u.F.O. extraterrestrial. i was taken back slightly to see that two weeks to the very day.... that one was reported to the south of here in massachusetts. not far away in flight terms. identical described. this craft does exist... i am in witness thereof; what bites you on the nose you can't deny. there must be no doubt the military knows of this craft. it didn't seem to mind anyone looking at it, all lit up on the bottom with the blinking red light....Seemed close to the speed in between real navigation light blinking as well. my experience with this sighting was that it was for sure stealthy. maybe military. where there's smoke there's fire. this craft .....What ever it may be is traveling the new england corridor right now. i,ve been looking up about every night now when i step out; and so should you all.
content.summary: 3 am..Heard dull rumble... looked up to see dark triangle, low speed, single solid white light on tips and a smaller red blinking light center bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing at the kitchen window, peeling potatoes in the sink.  the window faces west.   the sky was clear and the sun had begun to set.  nobody else was in the house.   i noticed a small black object on the western horizon (the view from this window is about 3/4 mile, across undeveloped land and marshland).   i looked down to watch what i was doing, then looked back out the window and was astonished to see the object was moving straight towards the house, at an elevation i cannot estimate, but i could clearly see that the object was a black disk, with no visible features, and it was quite large. it did once turn over - which really startled me.    it continued overhead, moving then southeasterly.  i heard no noise, but i was indoors.   my impression is that from the moment i first saw the object until it passed overhead, its altitude lowered.  i did not go to the east side of my home to watch further, as guests were due to dinner and i was busy.

our location is semi-rural, near the little river on the westerly side of our farm, and buzzards bay lies to the east of smith neck road.  the area has much property in conservation or preservation.

in the past several years, from time to time after nightfall, 2 or 3 small yellowish lights on the western horizon.  we do not know what they are.   they appear to hover for a time, then move a little. we've thought they must be helicopters - but we could see only the lights the objects made.  we could hear no sound from them, and we can only estimate their distance from our house at perhaps 2 miles.  they were at low altitudes. sometimes they were in view for most of an hour.      i have not looked for those recently.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a black object proceeding east.  as it got closer, it seemed to flip and was obviously a  large, black disk. it passed overhead, veering slightly to the southeast.

content.detailedDescription: It was 1974 i was 7 years old in balch springs, tx. i was playing in my backyard around dusk 630 to 700pm   when it was close to getting dark.All i remember is that i noticed all of a sudden my surroundings became quieter, real still all of a sudden and i felt like iu was being watched.  i remember sitting on the ground playin when i noticed this strange quiet feeling and it made me look up, and there on the lawen, about 10 to 15 feet from me was this saucer shaped ship with red green yellow and blue lightsin a line on the middle of it the ship itself was a grey colored but shiny gray....And it was just sitting there watching me, i did not know what ufos were  so i didnt understand what i was seeing and i dont remember what i did upon seeing it, but i know i didnt go run screaming about it, but i have no memory about what happenend after i seen it.I felt calm, like it was normal seeing it, and then in 1989, i saw a book about ufos, and finally learned what they were, and knew that that was what i had seen all those years ago as a child. ive always wondered what happened to me when i seen it in my yard, if anything did, because i dont have any memory of going into my house or anything afterwards.But i know for a fact that they exist because i seen one when i didnt even realize what i was seeing, and i know our universe is too vast for higher evolved beings not to exist.....I wish they would make contact with us, but we are like children ,primitive in our ways,very unevolved.So they probably wont because of our war-like ways.  it is the mark of a primitive society to call itself not primitive. but advanced technology without advanced thought is not advancement at all, but demise.
content.summary: I was just a child did not know what ufos were.

content.detailedDescription: At a bit passed 8pm i went out for a walk with my fiance. the skies were clear and we walked together and talked until we arrived to the gym's door area. as i was going to say good bye before my work out i looked up in the sky.  i saw immediately many lights at least 5 or 6 moving fast and chasing each other. they were not flying in a straight line and they were not airplanes. i pointed them to my fiance who happens to be an airline pilot and he also saw them. he said, "they must be satellites". i said they can't be satellites, there are too many and they are moving in irregular patterns. after no more than 15 seconds all of the lights vanished. i looked and try to spot them elsewehere in the sky but i didn't see anything else like it. we did see seconds later 2 planes flying from different directions and altitudes but definitely not related nor similar to the lights we saw previously.
content.summary: Strange moving lights in the sky of miami

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on hwy 49 from nevada city going toward grass valley about 2:30pm when i saw a big, bright white, glowing cylinder object that appeared to be hovering above the trees at a slant. this "rod" type object was about two inches at arm's length in the southeast direction. as i continued driving and keeping an eye on it, i lost sight of it from the trees. i tried to locate it and then came around on the road and saw a very low, flat, "squished" cloud-like object that was about 8 inches to a foot long at arm's length. it was the weirdest thing since there wasn't a cloud in the sky and the weather was gorgeous. i only saw that cloud-like thing for a minute and then lost sight of that from the trees. i tried to take pictures but it was difficult while driving.
content.summary: I was driving on hwy 49 and saw a bright, glowing cylinder shaped object hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving with mom she was taking me to gym, said ohh a shooting star but then it didnt go away kept descending and then diasappeared behind houses.
then we got excited and wondered what it was said to fast to be airplane too big and lasted to long to be shooting star no end trail like on a comet  

























































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































as not a shooting star or airpalne

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from an sat preperation class at cox highschool, and i wanted to take the long way home because i wanted to drive for a bit. i was driving down n. lynnhaven road, and pulled into the st. nicholas church parking lot because i wanted to sit and look up at the stars (i have always been very interested in the astronomy.) i was watching the airliners and looking at the planet conjunction of venus and jupiter off to the west, (i believe it is venus and jupiter, dont quote me on that), anyways, planetary alignment to the west, i noticed out of the corner of my eye, maybe ne or nne, a bright white light, and i thought, oh neat a shooting star, but as i turned my head, i saw it make strange movements. the object was right above the tree line from my pov, it shot up at an angle to the right, slightly less than 90 degrees, then made a sharp u-turn to the left, and it squiggled down below the tree line, where i lost sight of it, then it shot straight up back above the tree line, this time at an angle to the left, and dissipated in the night sky. the object was very small, the light was bright white light, sort of like an orb, i could tell it was solid, there is absolutely no chance it was a spotlight of any kind, i could tell by lookng at it, it was a solid object. anyways, the orb had a glow around it, the same color and light intensity as the object itself, with what seemed to be a very short trail after it. for people that know how to measure degrees in the sky, the trail was about 1 degree in length behind it. it stayed that length throughout the whole sighting. again i want to emphasize, it wasnt like a street light color, or a head light density, it looked like a solid, white, solid bright light. the whole sighting lasted less than three seconds, it was moving very very fast, with absolutely no noise, but do not eliminate the noise factor becasue i was a good distance away. as soon as i saw it, i pulled out my phone, and called my friend daniel murguia and left a frantic voice mail explaining what had happened, then called my other friend brian, who also didnt answer. no message was left for him, then i called another friend, rachel, i told her what i had just seen, as i was talking to her, i drove to where i thought the object may have been flying over, that was an elementary school in my neighborhood. i went to the soccer field, named brill field, and walked to the middle of the field, still on the phone, trying to see if i could get another glimpse of the ufo. unfortunately none was seen. i drove home, told my parents, im sure they dont believe me, the friend brian does not believe me, and the friend rachel, i could tell by her voice and attitude, was skeptical. though the first contact, daniel murguia, said he got chills when he listened to the voice mail i had left him. i hope my information was satisfactory, i surely hope to hear from whomever reads this soon. thank you.
content.summary: Bright solid white light zipped extremely fast in odd pattern

content.detailedDescription: On the night of aug31 2011 (although technically it was early sept1, because the time was ~1a), me and my girlfriend randomly realized we were both hungry. we decided to drive out to wendy's (the nearest open-late option). as we were leaving the neigborhood, we both turned to our right, looking down the street the way we were about to turn. it was a very short distance to a stop-lighted intersection, and across it were homes on either side (i think a home on one side had been converted into an autoshop). anyway, there were large bright red and white lights just above the small buildings there. the lights spanned larger than a normal/small house. my immediate reaction was that i was witnessing a jet crash. but as the milliseconds and seconds passed, my brain had to come to terms with the fact that the lights were hanging in place. i said to my girlfriend, "do you see anything?" i looked to her as i asked this, and her mouth was open, and eyes wide. we were still sitting at the stopsign at the end of our neighborhood. i turned down the street toward the object now. we came to the above-mentioned stoplight, and stopped. the object was still there. now we were literally across the street from this thing, leaning forward to see up through the windshield at this giant display literally mere feet above the house across the intersection. it seemed disc-like, but it was hard to tell- the surface was the flattest black youve (n)ever seen. in hindsight, i theorize that the surface was able to absorb all light as a way to camoflage itself. however, that is a little contradictory to the only other feature noticeable about this thing: the light-bank that surrounded it. on what would be the edge of the saucer, was a row of lights. they were not necessarily in a straight line; some were a little higher or lower than others. all the lights were red or white. they turned on or off. they didnt blink or strobe, but they were turning on and off- each independent of the others- in what seemed like a non-sense sequence. however, i must say that the feeling i had in my gut was that there was a pattern to it, i just simply wasnt able to understand it. i remember trying to notice a communicative pattern, but couldnt. the thing about the lights was that they didnt create visible "noise". they lit up almost like an indiglo watchface or something. the houses and trees- nothing was cast in white or red when the lights shown. now, to the movement of the object. the object was tilted to one side. also it moved back and forth slightly, almost like- imagine if a helicopter was trying to stay in place; it cant stop in a 3-dimensional field of movement on one exact spot; it has to move slightly up, down and then back to stay right at the spot they want, but not right on that spot- thats how this thing moved. but it was very slight. it appeared to be trying to stay right above this one house. it was just at the top of the trees in that neighborhood. there was no sound. we were in my jeep, which had a soft top on, but all the windows uninstalled. we sat at the red light staring at it, nobody talking. then the major light effects seemed to calm down (but there were still visible lights), and the thing lowered down into the trees, down over the house. at this point i said, "let's go on, and maybe we can see it better from another angle". however that was stupid, because our journey led us completely away from the site. it was so dumb to drive away, but that was the sensible thought i had at the moment, even though i could have went straight (instead of turning right), and i would have been beside the house! i drove just a little ways down the road, and i realized: how stupid! i said "we are just getting further away! why didnt i drive into the neighborhood!?" my girlfriend said "i dont know". i said "why didnt you tell me to drive into the neighborhood?" she said "i dont know, i was just going with what you were doing". "should i turn back?" we looked back and could see no strange lights. we continued on. i really feel that we were "diverted". im not necessarily taking it to the extreme of "mind-control", but i think i was remotely influenced to pass on by the sight. the drive was a strange mix of silence and excited talking. to my suprise, my girlfriend brought up that at first, she thought she was witnessing the crash of an aircraft- exactly what i had felt internally! we brainstormed on things it couldve been. we asked eachother repeatedly "did we just see a ufo?". that night i had a strange dream about "grey" aliens. i dont want to recount it here. but i will say, that i dont believe it was a "memory" of an abduction or something, as the setting was somewhere far away (and from my childhood), and it was daylight in the dream. also, my entire family was in the dream. the next morning when i woke up, i felt emotionally shell-shocked. i thought of the lights and the object, and my eyes watered, like i was about to cry. i said to my girlfriend: "was that real?" anyway, that's about it. i have more details and theories, but im with-holding them for some semblance of brevity. if you have questions or helpful comments, i hope there is a way for mufon to put you in touch with me through email.
content.summary: Ufo seen very close range by 2 people- it hovered directly over a house at a distance from us of "across the street"

content.detailedDescription:
In my back yard watching stars over the desert then suddenly to my right apprx 75 feet away a very! bright round object. it was like a flood light, but the light did not spread. it stayed just around it. hovered over the desert and then took off at fantastic speed and made mulitple stops were it used light or beam as if searching ground for something. only noise i heard was air as it went by.

i watched it till it went over hills behind my home.

i was not afraid at all, in point of fact i was really calm about the whole thing. this is not my first siteing, and not my last.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sudden, searching

content.detailedDescription: I was living in iriqoise point in honolulu hawaii. i came home late at night at around 3am. i went to my room upstairs and sat down on my bed. i had in my room a small radio but this was shut off. i began thinking about things until the event happened. i started hearing a radar in my head.It sounded like a radar from a sattelite or a navy ship.I then stood up and said 'does anyone else hear that!'my sister was sleeping in her room and noone heard me, because everyone was asleep and my door was shut.I sat back down on my bed as the radar continued.I then looked to my right where my window was and saw very bright lights flashing from a u.F.O. extremely close to my window. it began flashing the colors red,yellow,blue,and green simultaniously.As i witnessed this i stood up on my feet and began to walk towards the window.It was then that there was no doubt in my heart and in my mind that this was a genuine u.F.O..I put my hand on the string to lift up the blinds but was sure that i would be traumatized severely if i lifted up those blinds, because of the fact that this u.F.O. was only 5 feet away from my window.I went back to my bed and sat down.The sound of the radar grew louder. i felt as though i was being challenged with this radar.I looked right at the u.F.O. and began to try very hard to make it bow down to me with telekinisis.This did nothing to the u.F.O.. the one who controlled this u.F.O. and this radar decided to end this attempt. within 3.7 seconds of me trying to do this. the radar jumped extremely loud. i imediately covered my ears and began screaming out of pain from this sound as i fell on my back on the bed.All of these events, i swear to you happened and the attack lasted 8 seconds. the radar stoped and as soon as it stoped my little radio which was turned off came on.The u.F.O. then  left.The song 'let's just kiss and say goodbye' the ub40 cover was playing and was this aliens message to me.After 12 seconds of hearing this song i ran to my sisters room across the hallway.I knocked on her door and told her what had happened.I was shaking and she did not believe me.I stayed downstairs after this and continued shaking the rest of the night.I could not go to sleep that night and will never be the same.
content.summary: I was attacked by the radar of a u.F.O.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving route 10 east, at the intersection of franklin avenue in denville, new jersey at 5.55am aprox. i saw a grey oval object with white bright lights at the beginnig and at the end of the ufo that was stationary behind a gas station, suddenly the object descent. after that i could not see it anymore.
content.summary: Grey oval like object descended fast. at 5.55am

content.detailedDescription:
When i first saw an alien in a public place, i was amazed that nobody else seem to notice. this event occurred at the berkeley flea market back in 1996 or 97. it was a beautiful summer day. i had set up my display featuring a large photo of a flying saucer right up front. the market was busy but not too crowded. someone caught my eye, it was a tall figure moving among the crowd looking at the sky, ground, other people as if very curious. but no one seemed to notice, even my friend standing next to me didn't see this seven foot tall figure walking toward us until i said,
"anton, do you see that person coming this way?"
"yes, why?'
"look at his face. that's an alien!"
"wow, he is very unusual looking."
the face was human looking but the bone structure was radically different. there were deep ridges on the sides of his forehead and the skull seem oddly shaped. his clothes were very ordinary and dull, with no buttons, patterns, shoe strings, zippers or anything that stood out. suddenly, he stopped and looked at the saucer photo, then he looked at me, then back at the saucer, then at me again. he began to move erratically, turning away like he was about to walk away, then turning his torso back toward me, then away with his arms moving up and down like a confused robot. finally he started to walk away quickly.I told anton to watch my stall so i can follow him.
i followed about 25 feet behind him with several people between us. when he got to the bart station he suddenly stopped, and stood with his back to me until he spun around and stared directly at my face. i completely shocked. he knew i was following him. again he made the weird movements, like he wanted to communicate but couldn't, then he walked into the station. i panicked and ran away back to the stall.
that was the first encounter.
content.summary: Humanoid over 7 ft tall, ridges on side of head, seemed confused.

content.detailedDescription: We were at home fixing a late dinner. husband went outside to take the dogs for their evening constitutional, when he saw the two objects.  he came hollering onto the front porch for me to come outside and look!  i rushed out to see what it was.  there were two orbs in the sky, one higher and pure white, the other lower and slightly to the north of first one.  the lower one flashed red/green/white in rapid succession.  they were out over the ocean, but near the shore, moving much too slowly to have been orbiting satellites or the space station.  they hovered briefly, then very slowly moved toward the east until we lost sight of them due to the hills and trees up behind us, nearly 20 minutes total viewing time. my husband was spooked by them, and very nervous. he didn't like them.  my background is that of a navy brat - grew up with regular training and practice of navigating by the stars.  i've long (over 50 years) been involved in star gazing, watching all sorts of celestial events, none of which compared to these objects.  they were much closer than any orbiting objects i've observed in the past.  not meteor showers. very deliberate and slow. not as fast as even a commercial jet liner.  i was fascinated.
content.summary: Two objects, one lower. low one flashed colors. moved easterly then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: At approx 12:15am 01.01.12, my neighbor and i where watching some fireworks around our neighborhood. i saw what appeared at first as an aerial comet coming out of the southwest sky. we waited for it to explode but it didn't. it proceeded on a southwest to northeast at a significant rate of speed, following this course until it disappeared over the horizon. no sound was heard. it was a clear sky and there was no contrail or silouette of an aircraft or aircraft id lights. i was curious to know if anyone else had seen this.
content.summary: Unknown glowing translucent object sighted by myself and neighbor

content.detailedDescription: Going to the store at 3:50am north on dorin rd looking west i saw an orange line in the sky above the tree line, about 3/4 mile of a mile away. appearing odd, it tilted slightly, and i saw small colored lights under the glowing orange line.  i pulled over at the intersection of i94 & dorin rd & watched the continuous orange shape fade slightly and re-illuminate as it moved westerly across i94 toward kiksey ky., for less than a minute. normally i have my cell phone, bot this time i unfortunately was charging it. it would of probably been appeared as an orange line in a sea of black.
content.summary: Glowing orange line, with small colored lights under for a short time. moving west slowly toward kirksey ky.

content.detailedDescription: Forgot to attach this as well.
content.summary: Morte to sherwood park

content.detailedDescription: It was mar 03, 2012 at 5:03 in the morning. i looked out the back window to see an overcast sky with a few snow flakes falling. just then i noticed a faint hue of light moving in the clouds. my camera is always ready to go and was sitting on the kitchen table. i was looking south and noticed that it was now on a determined path to head north. i kept snapping pictures as it went over my house. when i ran to the front window i could not pick it up again. the attached was shot into the clouds using a 16 megapixel camera with night vision capabilitied and zoom. looks like a chevron or triangle.
content.summary: Sherwood park - chevron or triangle

content.detailedDescription:
Wellington, fl, 4 march 2012, approximately 1030-1045 pm. i was outside my house in my pool area. saw a total of 14 red-orange objects coming from the n/nw (approximately 334 degrees) heading s/se (approximately 178 degrees). the first group was 12, then a few minutes later 2 more came from the same direction (nw to se). all were in a straight line, as if following the same navigational heading. they were going in the direction of the atlantic ocean, and probably would have reached the atlantic near lake worth or boca raton, fl. they passed directly over my house, and were totally silent. i estimate the entire formation stretched out for 1-2 miles.  i could not judge their height or speed, but had a speed similar to a helicopter. after passing my house they (the lights eminating from the objects) faded away after about 45 seconds to 1 minute while heading se. i have lived here 8 years and have never seen anything like this before. there is a pratt whitney facility that builds helicopters in the approximate direction they cam from. perhaps some new type of stealth technology?

1. outside in my pool area.
2. wife saw them first, she told me to look up.
3. i thought they were a large formation of helicopters, but they were totally silent.  
4.  just red-orange glowing lights flying in a formation as i described.  i am pretty certain they were all separate "small" objects, not one large object.
5.  amazement, we stayed outside and watched them.  as i said above, at first there was a large formation all heading in a line in the exact same direction.  once this group of 12 disappeared 2 more of the same objects came from the nw passed over my home and headed se, and they disappeared from view.
6.  they just seemed to fade away.
content.summary: Large formation of red-orange lights fly silently over wellington, florida

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving westbound on rt 6 near utica il i looked to the southwest of the sky because a blue light appeared out of nowhere. at first i was like cool, the only star in the sky! but then i realized it was cloudy and had been raining so there were no stars visible at this time. all of the sudden the object got brighter and was moving northeast at an incredible speed. no flashing lights, no marker lights or anything blinking. it was a solid light source and controlled flight. as the object got closer the color changed to a yellowish orange color. it's kind of hard to describe the shape because it almost looked cylinder but positioned vertical rather than horizontal. the speed was so fast. i guessed that from where i spotted the object and to where i last seen it had to cover at least a 100 miles and the object covered that in less than a 10 second time frame. i kept turning my head to look out the back window and right before i lost visual the color had gone back to the blue color looking like a star again. it was so far away yet i could still see it. the feeling it gave me was that i knew right away it was some kind of craft not from this planet but i remained calm and felt as if they knew i was watching it fly across the sky.
content.summary: I first noticed a blue light looked like a star but it was a cloudy morning, no stars visible.

content.detailedDescription: Well me and my family were driving along a small road near saint petersburg. we wanted to camp out there. we were driving until our car and everything electronic we had slowly stopped working. when we looked out the window we saw a large disc hovering above a forest near us. we watched it and we were all very tense. i became so scared that my heart rate was getting very high. the ufo was metalic-black and there were very bright yellow lights on it. it hovered for about 5minutes then it very fast shot away. out car turned back on and we went back to petrozavodsk because we were very scared! (we believe "aliens" aren't friendly beings)
content.summary: Tense and scary

content.detailedDescription: A plane, red & white lights flashing... was in sky soon after, small in comparison... this all happened 11:30 ish... don't know really how long, descent, porch roof was in the way... about 2" from where we could see down ?, green, no tail, maybe roundish, then gone, duration 1 secondish,fast... shooting star? at this time? or...?
content.summary: Green light, seemed circular, went about 2", disappeared, fast

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were driving westbound on the 10 freeway near west covina around 6:20-6:30 this evening, when we first noticed what looked like the brightest light in the sky, over the downtown la skyline. we reasoned that it was much too bright to be a star because the sun was then still setting, but it was not moving at all, so we doubted that it was an airplane or a helicopter. it seemed at first to be about as distant as the ocean. it went away a few times, and returned as bright as before. it seemed a lot closer to us during the second or third re-appearance, approximately over el monte. it began to look like it was made up of two separate lights and we began to joke that it was just a star performing mitosis, when it appeared to be flickering in many colors much like a police light. it appeared to be "m" shaped to us, either because the object itself was shaped like an m, or because of beams of light emanating from the bottom of it in diagonal lines. the entire object looked to be pulsating with white light. it was difficult to focus on, it seemed like my eyes had to continually re-adjust to the brightness of it, making it difficult to perceive how close or far away it was from us. it even seemed that the colors of the object were also difficult to focus our eyes on. after about thirty to sixty seconds it seemed to get dimmer and move away in a southwest direction and we couldn't see it anymore. it did come back again but the last time we saw it, it was just a bright light high in the sky like it was before. we were exiting the freeway in san gabriel when we lost sight of the object for the rest of the night.
content.summary: Bright star-like objects in san gabriel valley

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside on the lounge of a club at the hardrock casino in hollywood florida when i saw the object. i starred at the object moving from the east near the beaches to the west thinking at first it was another airplane from the nearby ft.Lauderdale airport but quickly realized it was not a plane. it was flying steady with a blue light that seemed to be spinning with the object. it did not have the usual flashing tail and wing lights like so many airplanes that land at the nearby airport. it did not have any spinning blades nor did it have a rear tail light and seemed to be moving to fast for a helicopter. i have always looked up at the planes to see if i could witness a ufo but they all have the same four lights,this did not have those key features. i am posting this sighting so others that may have seen it will have some comfort in knowing they are not alone in what they saw. the experience is surreal but i know it was a ufo i spotted last night.
content.summary: Object spinning with blue light but no wings and no helicopter blades. moving too fast for a helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: As a small child i can remember my father standing on our front porch of our garage apartment and calling for my mother to come outside. she went out to the porch with him, i can still remember the urgency in his voice. i remember them talking in a low excited voices and as a child i wanted to know what was so interesting. i can remember going out on the front porch of our garage apartment and looking up. to my amazement at tree top level was a circular object hoovering above our yard. i felt no worry, in fact i remember feeling very calm, and thinking to myself, oh good they have come to take me home. the object that i was looking at was large and circular with a dome on top and bottom. around the edge of the lip was a band of lights, no not lights, was more like a window that allowed lights to circulate around the edge of the craft. when the lights came on they would appear in patterns. these lights ran around the edge of the object, but in a repeating pattern of two or three different patterns. always in the same colors of yellow, blue, red, or green. but not always in the same sequence. i don't know for sure how long they were there but i do remember wishing that they would take me home with them. i felt like they had come for me. i knew that the object was from another world and could almost feel a link with them as a child. then as we watched the object shot start up so far that it appeared to be about the size of a dime in the sky and off to the west over the airport. we stood there amazed for a couple of minutes and then went into the house, my father called the airport to see if they had picked up anything on their radar. i can remember him asking for the control tower and then after they picked up he kept asking why do you need to know that and hung up the phone without giving them any information. as soon as he hung up the phone i can remember he yanked the phone cord out of the wall and we did not plug it back in for a few days. i felt sad that i had been left behind, but also seemed to feel that they would be back for me.
content.summary: Parents and i stood on porch and watched object hoover in our front yard. i felt they had come to take me home, as a child.

content.detailedDescription:
My elevation is 3500 feet above sea level in the sierra nevada. i was sitting on my deck facing west, when i noticed an unidentifiable object coming in my direction from the northwest. 10:00 position from the north. it seemed large in comparison to the houses on the ridge so that ruled out balloons. when i first saw it the approximate size was  size of the moon and appeared to be tumbling, floating slowly and ascending  as it came my direction (south east). it was white in color, and had a primary form of what appeared to be square, but that was not the complete form. it was unexplainable. as it tumbled and floated closer, the shape would change and was getting smaller as it approached.  it was very silent, and did not disrupt dogs in the neighborhood. 

i watched for at least 5 minutes trying to figure out what it was, because the shape was so odd.  i then went into the house to get my iphone. when i came back outside it was still coming in my direction but much smaller and higher. the sun was very bright, which made it impossible to see if i was positioned on the object when i snapped the pictures.  it stopped moving south easterly as it was  slightly over my house and sat in one position for 15 minutes. i called the national reporting agency, and while on the telephone with them, it then began to ascend higher until it disappeared.
content.summary: Observed an slient object that appeared to be floating and tumbling and changing shape as it approached from the north west heading south east
